parameters:
\AA[FFFF]\FFFF[1020Eriza_0005]\N<Eliza>Hmm... you've arrived. Choose your destination wisely. And
take care not to overdo it...

\AA[FFFFF]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0000]\N<Eliza>【Hellfire Mountain】Danger Level: ??? The Hellfire Mountain
indicated by the mysterious transmission. If it truly is the
BB Gang's base, it will likely be the final battle. Pass on
their fate and rescue your dear one.

\AA[FFFFF]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0005]\N<Eliza>【Inlet Cave】Danger Level: 4 There have been sightings of
tentacle monsters. It's likely their lair. If you're going,
be sure not to let your guard down.

\AA[FFFFF]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0000]\N<Eliza>【Inlet Cave】Danger Level: 4 The commotion with the tentacle
monsters seems to have settled down. By defeating the
tentacle boss, the monster disturbance should subside soon.
It's all thanks to you, Pure Flame.

\AA[FFFFF]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0005]\N<Eliza>【Mountain Path】Danger Level: 5 There have been reports of
wolves causing havoc. Given the BB Gang's actions and
statements, this doesn't seem like just an animal
disturbance. I'd like you to investigate and suppress them.

\AA[FFFFF]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0000]\N<Eliza>【Mountain Path】Danger Level: 5 It seems a giant wolf used as
a test subject by the BB Gang was the cause of the ferocity.
Pure Flame, I'm glad you were able to safely secure a
victory.

\AA[FFFFF]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0000]\N<Eliza>【Urban Area】Danger Level: 6 There have been uploads of
sightings, images, and videos of Pure Flame on the net in
the city. It's confirmed you haven't been here, so it's
likely one of the BB Gang's monsters. I've also heard about
brainwashed citizens; please defeat the Fake Pure Flame.

\AA[FFFFF]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0000]\N<Eliza>【Urban Area】Danger Level: 6 You've successfully defeated the
Fake Pure Flame. The brainwashed people seem to have been
freed as well. You did well.

\AA[FFFFF]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0000]\N<Eliza>【Abandoned Mine】Danger Level: 1 There have been numerous
sightings of BB Gang soldiers, "The Cores", in the abandoned
mine recently. They might be plotting something. Please go
and check it out!!

\AA[FFFFF]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0000]\N<Eliza>【Abandoned Mine】Danger Level: 1 This is where The Cores
gathered and were pursued. This place is already resolved.

\AA[FFFFF]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0000]\N<Eliza>【Forest】Danger Level: 2 There have been reports of
"Goblins", monsters controlled by the BB Gang, appearing.
There are also reports of missing local residents, they seem
to be plotting something. Please scatter those goblin
brutes!!

\AA[FFFFF]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0000]\N<Eliza>【Forest】Danger Level: 2 The goblin brutes were plotting evil
deeds. But, it's already resolved now.

\AA[FFFFF]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0000]\N<Eliza>【Waterway】Danger Level: 3 It seems monsters released by the
BB Gang have infiltrated the waterway. They must be plotting
something!! Crush the enemy before they cause trouble!!

\AA[FFFFF]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0000]\N<Eliza>【Waterway】Danger Level: 3 Planning to mix poison into the
drinking water was an outrageous plot... but this place is
also resolved now.
